content.rendered:
Directed by Indrajit Lankesh. Indrajit Lankesh.

Cast .V. Ravichandran.Chandan Kumar. Sudeep(Self – (Guest Appearance)).P. Ravi Shankar.Sadhu Kokila. Srujan Lokesh(Guest Appearance). Sunny Leone(Guest Appearance). Sammir Dattani(Guest Appearance (as Dhyan)).Sudharani. Nikesha Patel(Guest Appearance (as Nikeesha Patel)).Bullet Prakash.Shakeela . Kiran Chandan(Kiran). Sangeeta Chauhan(Alia). Bhoomika Chawla(Bhoomi). Ravichandran(Dr. Ravi’s). Sheetal Shetty(News Reader)

Languages Kannada. Hindi. Telugu.

Producers Sahni Bob.

Production Sammy’s Magic Cinema.
